title: Beyond the Hype: Harvard Research on What Actually Drives AI Marketing Success (A Flable Perspective)
excerpt: Flable AI unpacks the data behind meaningful marketing wins—what separates short-term AI buzz from true success, according to Harvard studies.
content:
While 'AI in marketing' gets plenty of headlines, Harvard’s recent research (and Flable’s own client experience) shows real impact comes down to:

  • Building practical, organization-wide AI fluency
  • Choosing the right initiatives (not just tools)
  • Focusing relentlessly on measurable outcomes

Flable’s Take: Skip the hype, double down on education, and treat every AI project as an experiment—measured, refined, then scaled.

attribution.sourceTitle: Why So Many High-Profile Digital Transformations Fail
